alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 415 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jupiter, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Tequesta, Juno Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, North County Airport, Juno Ridge, The Acreage, Philo Farms, Fau North Campus, Limestone Creek, Caloosa and Jupiter Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
